text: Daniel Auteuil (; born 24 January 1950) is a French actor. Auteuil was born in Algiers, French Algeria. He was raised in Avignon and Nancy. He won a Prix d'Interpretation Masculin for Best Actor for his role in The Eighth Day (Le huiti√®me jour) and a BAFTA Award for his role in Jean de Florette. == Other websites == * * Category:1950 births Category:Actors from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Avignon Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Algiers
title: Daniel Auteuil
